structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Duty of assisted-living community to provide copy of KRS 194A.700 to 194A.729 and relevant administrative regulations to interested persons.
law.text: An assisted-living community shall provide any interested person with a copy of KRS 194A.700 to 194A.729 and relevant administrative regulations.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 11, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 165, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000.
